name: ElysiumPit
description: A high-intensity pit gamemode for the Elysium Network featuring custom items, unique currency, bespoke armor sets, and engaging PvP mechanics. Designed for competitive gameplay and leaderboards.

name: ItemX
description: A versatile item creation plugin with over 160+ fully customizable items, each with unique lore, names, and effects. Designed to enhance creativity and expand server gameplay possibilities.

name: Leorion
description: A fully custom MMORPG plugin including unique armor sets, mechanics, items, mobs, quests, and much more. Built to deliver a rich, immersive RPG experience within Minecraft.

name: LeorionLogin
description: A secure, custom login plugin for Leorion servers, ensuring reliable authentication, account management, and enhanced security for players.

name: LeagueMC
description: An experimental MMORPG server with over 300+ active members, featuring custom armor, items, mobs, and advanced RPG mechanics. Designed as a proof-of-concept for large-scale MMORPG integration.

name: TridentXMace
description: A custom plugin adding a unique trident with wind-based abilities, crafting rituals that grant unstable tridents with random effects, and other exciting features.

name: AnthraxRPG
description: A cutting-edge custom MMORPG server incorporating unique mechanics, immersive quests, and a rich progression system to deliver an engaging gameplay experience.
